Kata Wamen Agama Soal Ide Radikalisme Jadi Manipulator Agama
03 Nov 2019, 01:57 by Andita Rahma, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Wakil Menteri Agama Zainut Tauhid angkat bicara soal wacana Presiden Joko Widodo atau Jokowi yang akan menggunakan istilah manipulator agama untuk mengganti radikalisme.
Zainut pun turut memberikan nama lain yakni perusuh agama. "Apapun istilahnya, apakah itu manipulator agama atau perusuh agama, perusuh yang menciptakan situasi yang bisa mencerai-beraikan bangsa Indonesia, itu harus kita tolak bersama saya kira itu yang harus dipahami adalah semangat bapak presiden memahami agama," kata dia di kantornya, Jakarta Pusat pada Ahad, 3 November 2019.
Pelabelan istilah baru untuk radikalisme itu diutarakan Jokowi sebagai salah satu upayanya untuk mencegah meluasnya gerakan tersebut.
"Harus ada upaya yang serius untuk mencegah meluasnya, dengan apa yang sekarang ini banyak disebut yaitu mengenai radikalisme," kata Jokowi di Istana Negara, Jakarta Pusat pada 31 Oktober 2019.
Jokowi kemudian sempat melempar wacana untuk mengubah istilah gerakan radikalisme. Dia menyebut frasa 'manipulator agama' mungkin bisa menjadi pengganti dari 'gerakan radikalisme'. "Atau mungkin enggak tahu, apakah ada istilah lain yang bisa kita gunakan, misalnya manipulator agama," ujar Jokowi.

Said the Deputy Minister of Religion Regarding the Idea of Radicalism Becoming a Manipulator of Religion
03 Nov 2019, 01:57 by Andita Rahma, Syailendra Persada
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Deputy Minister of Religion Zainut Tauhid spoke about the discourse of President Joko Widodo or Jokowi who will use the term religious manipulator to replace radicalism.
Zainut also gave another name, religious rioters. "Whatever the term is, whether it is a religious manipulator or religious rioters, rioters who create situations that can scatter the Indonesian people, we must reject them together. I think that what must be understood is the spirit of the president to understand religion," he said in his office, Central Jakarta on Sunday, November 3, 2019.
Labeling the new term for radicalism was expressed by Jokowi as one of his efforts to prevent the movement from spreading.
"There must be a serious effort to prevent it from spreading, with what is now being mentioned is radicalism," Jokowi said at the State Palace, Central Jakarta on October 31, 2019.
Jokowi then had a chance to throw a discourse to change the term radicalism movement. He said the phrase 'religious manipulator' might be a substitute for 'radicalism'. "Or maybe you don't know, are there other terms we can use, for example religious manipulators," Jokowi said.
